headline: Sell Tesla, Inc. (TSLA) If You Don’t Like Musk’s $1 Trillion Package, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 15 Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed As He Said CEOs Were Afraid Of Hiring. Tesla, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Tesla, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA)’s iconic CEO, Elon Musk, was in the news again after the firm announced a new pay package that could see him become a trillionaire […]
